title: Delicious upper slice at Magnificent contractor project, ALL UTILS INC
posting_body: Easy on the eyes 6 rooms plus bath.
Some serious WOW effect here as we see just installed:
Gourmet level kitchen with new counters, cabinets, appliances, gas stove, backsplash, tile work, et al.
Hardwoods in all rooms just got the full refinishing work people look for--mirror like shine !
Granite bath with high end finishes incl new sink and vanity.
Top to bottom professionally done paint work with neutral tones.
Extra windows usher in exceptional levels of sunshine.
Easy 2 car parking.
Generous green space to be had.
If all this wasn't enough whats even nicer is the unique shapes and versatility of several of the rooms.
ALL UTILITIES (heat/hw, electric, cooking) and the parking come ALL INCLUSIVE the number.
Just 1 shoe to drop here-no laundry on site.
Surviving that enjoy an all around Stunner!
No smoking please.
On pets 1 cat considered.
Start is now to August 15 latest.
Fee prop.
Corner property with terrific views, light on both sides and a mother load of fabulous features.
Challenges comparison !
Call John Lambergs1, Ingram Realty
